content:
Borui Li(李博睿) is currently a PhD student at EmNets Research Group supervised by Prof. Wei Dong in the College of Computer Science, Zhejiang University.
He recieved the B.S. degree in 2017 from Bell Honors School, Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications, Nanjing, China.
summary: Borui Li(李博睿) is currently a PhD student at EmNets Research Group supervised by Prof. Wei Dong in the College of Computer Science, Zhejiang University. He recieved the B.S. degree in 2017 from Bell Honors School, Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications, Nanjing, China.
title: Borui Li

content:
LinkLab (Home Page) is a testbed for remotely developing and experimenting IoT applications. With LinkLab, IoT developers can write the application code on Web IDE, compile the code on cloud, and burn the Binary File to remote devices.
LinkLab focuses on providing developers with a user-friendly programming and experimenting environment by supplying multi-granularity allocation, naming mechanism, backup channel via USB, WebIDE, etc.
LinkLab consists of 3 parts: IoT Devices, LinkLab Infrastructure and Web IDE.
summary: Testbed for Remote Developing and Experimenting IoT Applications
title: LinkLab
Demo: Integrated Development of IoT Applications with OneLink
